description:
Get all the great features of the legendary Meridian drysuit in a less expensive fabric. Hydrus 3L is a proprietary waterproof-breathable fabric from Kokatat with similar performance, but less breathability than GORE-TEX®. It allows you to opt-in to the drysuit experience to enjoy comfort and protection that's far greater than a wetsuit. Integrated socks keep your feet dry and warm, while the relief zipper is a great convenience afloat and ashore.

  • Made with Kokatat Hydrus 3L waterproof-breathable fabric
  • Latex gasket with neoprene punch through collar and cuffs
  • Covered watersports entry zipper
  • Durable nylon waterproof dropseat zip
  • Self-draining zippered chest pocket with key lanyard
  • Competition-cut underarm for full paddling range of motion
  • Dual-adjustable overskirt with hook-and-loop compatible Ariaprene
  • Adjustable bungee drawcord at waist
  • 330D Hydrus Tough reinforced seat and knee patches for extra durability in high wear areas
  • Hook-and-loop adjustable neoprene over-cuffs at ankles
  • Factory sealed seams
  • Integrated Hydrus 3L socks
name: Kokatat Hydrus Meridian Dry Suit W - Women's
